project.name: C-C806C-SUBV-03-ST03-DT01-DF06-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C806C-SUBV-03-ST03-DT01-DF06-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Has a buffer declared on the heap. malloc(64*sizeOf(char)) If input is shorter than 64 it will overflowdue to using improper sizeof and strlen checking

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C806C-SUBV-03-ST03-DT01-DF06-CF03-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Has a buffer declared on the heap. malloc(64*sizeOf(char)) If input is shorter than 64 it will overflowdue to using improper sizeof and strlen checking

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hello World! If this statement isn't more than 64 characters, it will go badly" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
